meanings.definition: To surpass in rock music or rock-related activities.
meanings.sent1: The band really outrocks all the others at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Their new album outrocks their previous ones.
meanings.sent3: The guitar solo outrocks everything else in the song.
meanings.sent4: Her voice outrocks any other singer in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The energy of their performance outrocks any other band.

meanings.definition: To be better or more impressive than something else, especially in a rock-related context.
meanings.sent1: His guitar skills outrocks those of his bandmates.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display outrocks last year's show.
meanings.sent3: The rockstar's outfit outrocks all the other costumes.
meanings.sent4: The lead singer's charisma outrocks the rest of the band.
meanings.sent5: The stage presence of the lead guitarist outrocks everyone else.
